attributes.action: All four Nations of the United Kingdom should pay the NHS prescription charge.
attributes.background:
English citizens are the only people in the UK that have to pay prescription charges. Northern Irish, Scottish & Welsh are exempt from prescription charges.
To help preserve the NHS & in the interests of equality, I propose that all four nations in the United Kingdom pay for their prescriptions.

rejection.details: The UK Government is only responsible for the NHS in England. Prescription charges in Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland are the responsibility of the devolved governments.
